member.name: T:ModuleObjects.MemberParameter
member.summary: An object designed to hold the type and name of a member's parameter.

member.name: M:ModuleObjects.MemberParameter.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Default constructor.

member.name: M:ModuleObjects.MemberParameter.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that defines the parameter type and name through parameters.

member.name: P:ModuleObjects.MemberParameter.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the parameter type.

member.name: P:ModuleObjects.MemberParameter.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the parameter name.

member.name: P:ModuleObjects.MemberParameter.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the parameter description.

member.name: M:ModuleObjects.MemberParameter.IsEmpty
member.summary: Check to see if the MemberParameter is empty.
member.returns: Returns true if the name is not an empty string or null.

member.name: M:ModuleObjects.MemberParameter.ToString
member.summary: Overrides the ToString method and formats the string output of parameter type and name.
member.returns: A desired format for the parameter type and name.

member.name: T:ModuleObjects.Module
member.summary: Module object holds the name and description of a module.

member.name: M:ModuleObjects.Module.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Default constructor. initializes properties to empty strings/empty collections.
Initializes a new instance of the class specifying the name, description and methods.

member.name: M:ModuleObjects.Module.#ctor(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class specifing a Type.
member.param: Type object found in an Assembly.
File name of the dll file.

member.name: P:ModuleObjects.Module.IsSelected
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the member is selected.

member.name: P:ModuleObjects.Module.IsEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the module is enabled or disabled.

member.name: P:ModuleObjects.Module.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the module name.

member.name: P:ModuleObjects.Module.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the description of the module.

member.name: P:ModuleObjects.Module.Members
member.summary: Gets or sets all of the module members.

member.name: P:ModuleObjects.Module.Constructors
member.summary: Gets or sets the constructors in the current module.

member.name: P:ModuleObjects.Module.Properties
member.summary: Gets or sets the properties in the current module.

member.name: P:ModuleObjects.Module.Methods
member.summary: Gets or sets the members in the current module.

member.name: M:ModuleObjects.Module.ToString
member.summary: Overrides the ToString method and formats the string output.
member.returns: A desired format for the module name, description and all members contained in module.

member.name: T:ModuleObjects.ModuleConstructor
member.summary: ModuleConstructor object holds the class name, description and the parameters a constructor.

member.name: M:ModuleObjects.ModuleConstructor.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Default constructor.

member.name: M:ModuleObjects.ModuleConstructor.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection{ModuleObjects.MemberParameter})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with specified name, description, and parameters.

member.name: P:ModuleObjects.ModuleConstructor.Parameters
member.summary: Gets or sets the member parameters.

member.name: M:ModuleObjects.ModuleConstructor.ToString
member.summary: Overrides the ToString method and formats the string output.
member.returns: A desired format for the constructor name, description, and parameters.

member.name: T:ModuleObjects.ModuleMember
member.summary: The base class for ModuleConstructor, ModuleProperty, and ModuleMethod.

member.name: P:ModuleObjects.ModuleMember.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the member.

member.name: P:ModuleObjects.ModuleMember.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the description of the member.

member.name: T:ModuleObjects.ModuleMethod
member.summary: ModuleMethod object holds the description, the parameters and the return type of a member.

member.name: M:ModuleObjects.ModuleMethod.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Default constructor.

member.name: M:ModuleObjects.ModuleMethod.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection{ModuleObjects.MemberParameter},System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with specified name, description, parameters return type and return description through passed in parameters.

member.name: P:ModuleObjects.ModuleMethod.Parameters
member.summary: Gets or sets the member parameters.

member.name: P:ModuleObjects.ModuleMethod.ReturnType
member.summary: Gets or sets the member return type.

member.name: P:ModuleObjects.ModuleMethod.ReturnDescription
member.summary: Gets or sets the member return description.

member.name: M:ModuleObjects.ModuleMethod.ToString
member.summary: Overrides the ToString method and formats the string output for the UI.
member.returns: A desired format for the member description, parameters and return type.

member.name: T:ModuleObjects.ModuleProperty
member.summary: ModuleProperty object holds the name, description, data type and accessor level of a property.

member.name: M:ModuleObjects.ModuleProperty.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Default constructor.

member.name: M:ModuleObjects.ModuleProperty.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with specified name, description, type and accessors

member.name: P:ModuleObjects.ModuleProperty.DataType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the property.

member.name: P:ModuleObjects.ModuleProperty.CanRead
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this property has a get accessor.

member.name: P:ModuleObjects.ModuleProperty.CanWrite
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this property has a set accessor.

member.name: M:ModuleObjects.ModuleProperty.ToString
member.summary: Overrides the ToString method and formats the string output.
member.returns: A desired format for the member description.
